name: GROV
description:
This game is made for the epic games megajam 2022!


Team Name

SeRo

Gameplay Instructions

Play with keyboard & mouse. Use WASD keys to move, use your mouse to click on wrenches to build your tower and trees for gathering wood.

List any content that was created before the jam

  • All audio (including music) is downloaded from weloveindies.com
  • Trees, bushes, grass, flowers, mushroom, clouds, castle parts with their materials and textures as well as landscape shaders and landscape textures are from Epic Games Stylized Rendering
  • Dungeon assets (as well as lava) both meshes, materials and textures are from Epic Games Elemental Demo
  • Hammer & Magic Wand meshes, their materials and their textures comes from Hero for RPG : Modular Polyart
  • Mouse Cursor was premade by the team

Game Engine

Unreal Engine 5
